name: Cloth Outfit
description:
Clothes made from Cloth.
Protects against cold nights.Cold Resistant Lv. 1

name: Metal Armor
description:
Armor made of metal.
Somewhat heavy, but provides good defense.Cold Resistant Lv. 1 Heat Resistant Lv. 1

name: Metal Helm
description:
A helm made of metal.
A reliable piece of armor that protects your head, and all the thoughts within.

name: Pelt Armor
description:
Armor made from Leather.
Its warmth and defense have been improved.Cold Resistant Lv. 1

name: Feathered Hair Band
description:
A beautiful feathered headband.
Though improbable, it somehow seems to protect its wearer from lethal head injuries.

name: Refined Metal Armor
description:
Armor made from high quality metal.
Quite heavy, but provides excellent defense.Cold Resistant Lv. 1 Heat Resistant Lv. 1

name: Refined Metal Helm
description:
A helm made from high quality metal.
The luster from the polished metal gives the wearer that added boost of confidence.

name: Pal Metal Armor
description:
Armor made from Pal Metal Ingot.
High defense, but extremely heavy.
Equipment for a hero, it exudes bravery.Cold Resistant Lv. 1 Heat Resistant Lv. 1

name: Pal Metal Helm
description:
A helm made from Pal Metal Ingot.
Envied for its immaculate quality, it is proof of a chosen warrior.

name: Common Shield
description:
Strange shield made with Paldium technology.
It automatically repair itself after not taking damage for a while.

name: Mega Shield
description:
Strange shield made with Paldium technology.
It automatically repair itself after not taking damage for a while.
The new model has been improved, enhancing its defense.

name: Giga Shield
description:
Strange shield made with Paldium technology.
It automatically repair itself after not taking damage for a while.
Modifications have enhanced its effectiveness even further.

name: Hyper Shield
description:
Strange shield made with Paldium technology.
It automatically repair itself after not taking damage for a while.
Through repeated testing, the highest quality has been achieved.

name: Monarch's Crown
description:
A crown for those who possess a high ranking.
Being quite heavy, it's not suited for practical use.Dragon Damage Reduction Lv. 1

name: Golden Crown
description:
A rare golden crown.
Just wearing it makes you feel like royalty.Ice Damage Reduction Lv. 1

name: Long-Eared Headband
description:
A cute headband with ears modeled after a Ribbuny.
It doesn't provide much head protection.Grass Damage Reduction Lv. 1

name: Witch Hat
description:
A hat modeled after a Wixen or Katress.
It makes you feel like you can use Pal skills.Dark Damage Reduction Lv. 1

name: Soft Hat
description:
A light and flexible cap perfect for everyday use.
Fashionable, it was once a
popular item on the island.Earth Damage Reduction Lv. 1

name: Helmet
description:
A tough helmet that protects its wearer's head.
It was apparently made after a number of people injured their heads
after taking a tumble off a Eikthyrdeer.Electric Damage Reduction Lv. 1

name: Silk Hat
description:
A gentleman's hat.
Those made from Sibelyx materials are considered luxury items,
but those made from Swee materials are of poor quality, and more commonly found.Fire Damage Reduction Lv. 1

name: Tricorne
description:
A cap for those who love to fight.
Its previous owner nearly drove Azurobe
to extinction.Water Damage Reduction Lv. 1

name: Explorer Cap
description:
A hat for explorers.
It protects from the bright rays of the sun.Heat Resistant Lv. 1

name: Graduation Cap
description:
A cap that makes its wearer feel smarter.
Was there once a school on this island?Speedy Worker Lv. 1

name: Farming Hat
description:
A hat for working in the fields.
It protects from the bright rays of the sun.Heat Resistant Lv. 1

name: Bowler Hat
description:
A tough, round hat.
It was sold with the guarantee that it wouldn't break
even if a Mammorest stepped on it.Neutral Damage Reduction Lv. 1

name: Tocotoco Cap
description:
Cap shaped like a Tocotoco.
Its gaudy design is visible from far away.Neutral Damage Reduction Lv. 1

name: Grinning Tocotoco Cap
description:
Cap shaped like a Tocotoco.
It makes those who wear it smile uncontrollably.Neutral Damage Reduction Lv. 1

name: Gumoss Cap
description: Cap shaped like a Gumoss.Grass Damage Reduction Lv. 1

name: Penking Cap
description: Hat shaped like a Penking.Ice Damage Reduction Lv. 1

name: Katress Cap
description: Hat shaped like a Katress.Dark Damage Reduction Lv. 1
